name: SWAY OF SEVEN
description:
CW: gore mention, abuse

a companion game to OCHITSUBAKI about hanashiro, the swan of white flower, and lun kochouran, a humble two-tailed cat, days before the end of the world.  lun kochouran is beckoning hanashiro to stay, to not be led astray by SEVEN's SWAY. and hanashiro is in their mind sublime.

am i here now, or have i been here before?
